sn35.177-179:1.1: “Yam, bhikkhave, aniccam, tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.177-179:1.3: Rupa, bhikkhave, anicca; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.177-179:1.4: Sadda anicca; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.177-179:1.5: Gandha anicca; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.177-179:1.6: Rasa anicca; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.177-179:1.7: Photthabba anicca; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.177-179:1.8: Dhamma anicca; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.177-179:1.9: Yam, bhikkhave, aniccam tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
